original_text: The young lions roared upon him, and yelled, and they made his land waste: his cities are burned without inhabitant.
korean_text: 어린 사자들이 그를 향하여 부르짖으며 소리를 질러 그의 땅을 황폐하게 하였으며 그의 성읍들은 불타서 주민이 없게 되었으며

sentences.original_text: The young lions roared upon him
and they made his land waste
his cities are burned without inhabitant
